dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold action, embracing uncertainty and pushing boundaries.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options, preferring stability and security over potential rewards.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will absorb knowledge through visual aids, such as images and videos.
Your FarTwin will digest information by listening to lectures or discussions.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to work independently, taking charge of their own projects.
Your FarTwin will thrive in team environments, building strong relationships with colleagues.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on instinct, focusing on short-term goals rather than long-term consequences.
Your FarTwin will methodically plan and schedule tasks, ensuring everything is completed efficiently.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and facts, making decisions based on objective evidence.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, using patterns and emotions to guide decision-making.

dimensions.label: Personal Growth Focus
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze their weaknesses, using negative self-talk to drive personal growth.
Your FarTwin will focus on their strengths, celebrating successes and learning from setbacks.

dimensions.label: Social Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with strangers?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly engage with new people, seeking social interactions and connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter environments, feeling overwhelmed by too much social interaction.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will convey artistic ideas through spoken words, using storytelling and language to bring concepts to life.
Your FarTwin will create art using visual mediums like images, videos, or music, using colors and textures to evoke emotions and convey messages.
